title: TikTok’s greatest hits: why are these old songs suddenly going viral?
text:
The internet has long gobbled up pop culture history only to spew it out transformed for a new generation. But TikTok, the increasingly prolific Chinese video social platform, has stretched the threads of relevance ever thinner. Gen Z are sharing their own dance routines to songs that had been lost to obscurity, often long before they were born.

Much as anyone over 25 finds the relentless stream of 30-second-long clips that have attracted millions of views baffling, so many of those dancing to them don’t know where the original material came from.

Here, then, is a guide for both parties: the origin stories of the songs that blew up on TikTok.

Tonight You Belong To Me
description: The internet has long gobbled up pop culture history only to spew it out transformed for a new generation.
